mapper.select: select sp.code from v_sys_permission sp left join sys_role_permission srp on srp.permission_id = sp.permission_id where sp.code is not null and trim(sp.code) != '' and exists ( select 1 from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id where sur.role_id = srp.role_id and su.id = #{userId} )

select
from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id where sr.role_sign = #{roleSign}
